execution_quality: Agent executed the cleanup command but appears to have only partially addressed the user's intent, requiring clarification and a follow-up request.
work_category: Local git cleanup to remove merged feature branches from the working directory.
summary: Agent took action on the cleanup request but misinterpreted scope, cleaning some branches but not all merged ones. The user's follow-up clarification indicates the agent needed to identify all fully merged branches, not just a subset, showing misalignment with the actual intent.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately re-requested with more specific scope: 'other local branches that have already been merged,' suggesting the first attempt was incomplete.
